name: Jack Spiegelman
story: Jack Spiegelman grew up in a small town in southern Europe where he honed his skills with a grenade launcher on the local shooting range. After joining the military, he quickly rose to the rank of Private due to his exceptional marksmanship and leadership skills. Jack is married with children and takes pride in providing for his family. He can come off as assertive and gruff, but this is just his way of pushing his teammates to be their best.
